paper_abstract: In this article, we show that for each property of graphs G in the polynomial hierarchy (PH) there is a sequence phi(1), phi(2),... of formulas of the full hybrid logic which are satisfied exactly by the frames in G. Moreover, the size of phi(n) is bounded by a polynomial in n. These results lead to the definition of syntactically defined fragments of hybrid logic whose model checking problem is complete for each degree in the polynomial hierarchy. (C) 2014 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Polynomial hierarchy graph properties in hybrid logic
